title: Implement CreateMissionSandbox() lifecycle function
description:
Implement CreateMissionSandbox() function that creates a shared sandbox for a mission epic.

CURRENT:
- sandbox.Manager.Create() exists but creates per-execution sandboxes
- No mission-level sandbox creation

NEEDED:
- CreateMissionSandbox(ctx, missionID) function
- Generates sandbox path: .sandboxes/mission-{ID}/
- Generates branch name: mission/{ID}-{slug} (slugified title)
- Calls sandbox.Manager.Create() with mission config
- Stores sandbox_path and branch_name in vc_mission_state
- Returns sandbox metadata

DESIGN:
- Use existing sandbox.Manager under the hood
- Add wrapper that integrates with vc_mission_state storage
- Idempotent: calling twice for same mission returns existing sandbox
acceptance_criteria:
- CreateMissionSandbox() function implemented
- Creates worktree at .sandboxes/mission-{ID}/
- Creates branch mission/{ID}-{slug}
- Stores metadata in vc_mission_state table
- Idempotent (returns existing if called twice)
- Tests verify sandbox creation
- Tests verify metadata persistence
notes:

- Added StablePaths and TitleSlug fields to SandboxConfig

- Implemented CreateMissionSandbox() function with idempotency
